summary: Completed comprehensive testing of WAConnect SaaS platform. All backend APIs (18/18) working perfectly. Frontend user journey fully functional: signup → business creation → product management → customer site access. WhatsApp integration (basic click-to-chat) working. Minor UI overlay issue identified but doesn't affect core functionality.

ui_bugs.issue: Emergent badge overlay prevents smooth modal interactions
ui_bugs.workaround: Force clicks work, functionality not broken

passed_tests: All 18 backend API endpoints (auth, business, products, bookings, orders, analytics)
